snippet.title: Squirrel with a Gun - Console Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Squirrel with a Gun is available now on PC and is coming to Xbox Series X|S and PS5 on October 15th! 🔫🐿️  

 @Steam  
: https://bit.ly/4cecBZH
 @EpicGamesStore  
 https://bit.ly/3AIXZU4

It is not easy, but it's fun, to be a squirrel with a gun! 
Squirrel with a Gun is a sandbox game that focuses on exploration and shooting combat. Defend yourself from random encounters with Agents using various weapons. Climb and jump across platforms with your natural squirrel skill, and use weapon recoil to cross even greater gaps. Explore the neighborhood from a squirrel's eye view. Talk with residents of the neighborhood and help them out for goodies... Or mug them for goodies!

Follow #squirrelwithagun on X: https://x.com/QuiteDan

Follow Maximum Entertainment on socials: 
X: https://twitter.com/MaximumEntmt
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/maximumentmt/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@maximumentmt
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/maximumentmt
Discord: https://discord.gg/maxent

#squirrelwithagun #swag #sandboxgame #simulation #simulator #simulatorgames #puzzleplatformer #sandboxshooter #squirrel
